item.source: How do i change intro messages?

item.title: How do i change intro messages?
item.dc:creator: @SirPali SirPali
item.description:
@SirPali wrote:

First go to Client.java and look for the first like of the intro screen eg Welcome to …

You should see something like this:
this is from my server btw

sendQuest("@dre@Main Menu", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dbl@Welcome to DutchScape Server", 8145); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@~~~@dbl@", 8147); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ NO FUCKIN 0 ITEMIN OR MASS CLICKING OR BANZ0RZ!", 8148); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ for commands type ::commands",8150); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ IMPORTANT!!!!",8151); sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@ DO NOT USE ::CAT ::NOCLIP OR ::SETITEM, IT BANNS YOU.",8152); sendQuest("@dre@You last logged in from @blu@"+IPPart1+"."+IPPart2+"."+IPPart3+"."+IPPart4+" @gre@ "+GetLastLogin(lastlogintime)+" @dre@ days ago.@dbl@", 8154); sendQuest("@dre@Players online: @gre@"+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(), 8155); sendQuest("@blu@===Your pk stats===", 8156); sendQuest("@red@Total Kills - "+killcount, 8157); sendQuest("@red@Pk Points - "+pkpoints, 8158); sendQuest("@red@Death Count - "+deathcount, 8159); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

This is the intro screen,as you see, the parts behind sendQuest are the stuff you see in the screen, you can just edit this.

Now for the message, again, in client.java search for the first line of the message, eg Welcome to …

You should see the entire message for all users, that means normal, admin and mod, it should look like this:

[code]
if(playerRights < 1) {
sendMessage(“Welcome to the Dutchscape Server!”);
sendMessage(“Pking anywhere except ::range!”);
sendMessage(“NO MASSCLICKING! It laggs…”);
sendMessage(“Fully working barages, might crash server though”);
sendMessage(“Get your egg basket at the uber1337 bunny”);
sendMessage(“In the Watchtower”);
sendMessage(“DON’T USE ::CAT NOCILIP OR SETITEM, IT BANNS YOU”);
sendMessage(“for commands type ::commands”);
}
if(playerRights == 1) {
sendMessage("Welcome back moderator "+playerName);
sendMessage(“Welcome to the Dutchscape Server!”);
sendMessage(“Pking anywhere except ::range!”);
sendMessage(“NO MASSCLICKING! It laggs…”);
sendMessage(“Fully working barages, might crash server though”);
sendMessage(“Get your egg basket at the uber1337 bunny”);
sendMessage(“In the Watchtower”);
sendMessage(“DON’T USE ::CAT NOCILIP OR SETITEM, IT BANNS YOU”);
sendMessage(“for commands type ::commands”);

             }
             if(playerRights >= 2) {
              sendMessage("Welcome back administrator "+playerName);
	  sendMessage("Welcome to the  Dutchscape Server!");
	  sendMessage("Pking anywhere except ::range!");
      sendMessage("NO MASSCLICKING! It laggs...");
      sendMessage("Fully working barages, might crash server though");
      sendMessage("Get your egg basket at the uber1337 bunny");
      sendMessage("In the Watchtower");
      sendMessage("If you crash and cant connect, restart your client");

sendMessage(“DON’T USE ::CAT NOCILIP OR SETITEM, IT BANNS YOU”);
sendMessage(“for commands type ::commands”);
}[/code]

Playerrights > 1 = normal players 1= mods 2= admins.

Edit, save, compile and run, enjoy!
